title: League client won't stop crashing after logging in until it crashes multiples times..
body: Title says it . I tried all methods I could think of , re-installing league , used the hextech repair tool ,repaired tool on the client and the debug software W10 provides,nothing works for me at the moment. My League compatibility is set to Windows 8 because Windows 10 isn't an option on there... . Any advice?

replies.body: I'd like to help, but I need some more details in addition to crashing.  What do you mean exactly when you say crash?  Can you give me a run through of what you're doing, and what you see?  When does it happen?  Do you receive any error messages specifically?  Anything can help!
Sure , after I login to the client , a message and pop up and said LolClient has stopped working everytime.
Thanks for the update!  Are you using any third party programs?  Apps like play.tv and overwolf have been known to cause similar issues.  If so, remove them and let me know!
yeah I use overwolf for CS:GO stats , let me try it and I wil llet you know tomorrow if I still have this bug. THANKS :D
Yeah , it was CSGO Stats from Overwolf... Thanks for solving this for me Porocles! =D
